jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibilities
Own all documentation in your product area. Write business descriptions, usage instructions, user manuals, and development interface descriptions for software products in English
Learns the product, conducts research, assists product owners in defining content and scope, develops, and maintains new and existing information solutions for end-users, installers, administrators, and implementers of products.
Drive documentation projects from start to finish and keep pace with agile development
Produce documentation that is complete, accurate, and easy to understand.
Learn and deepen your knowledge of NextLabs products and integrated third-party products.
Review the labels and messages in the product user interface.
Qualifications and Skills
Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Technical Communication, English or Translation;
CET-6 or TEM-8 certification;
Excellent writing and editing skills in both English and Chinese, with a focus on quality and attention to detail; strong logical organizational skills.
Able to quickly learn and understand complex technical topics and new technologies; 
Able to work independently with minimal supervision on different projects.
Competent in using software tools to aid documentation preparation, review, development, translation and publishing, able to quickly learn and master new tools;
Strong interpersonal communication skills (written and verbal), Able to work on a team with geographically distributed members.
Skilled at prioritization and handling of multiple projects simultaneously, able to work in a fast-paced environment;
Minimum of 1-3 years of experience (not required for new graduates) writing technical documentation including risk management or identity management software products.
Advanced Microsoft Word, Adobe PDF, authoring tools such as FrameMaker, and Oxygen XML Editor.
Experience developing documentation systems for applications in the Cloud.
jobInfo.address: 杭州西湖区创业大厦(华星路)华星路99号601室

brandComInfo.introduce:
Nextlabs我们是一家年轻的，创新的硅谷软件公司。自2005年，我们通过我们的数据中心的安全软件改变了公司管理信息的风险。我们对客户的责任和我们对自己的诚信和幽默引以为傲。
如果你对这个有远见的产品和服务充满热情和热爱，如果你对让人们用新的和更好的方法来解决老问题的感到兴奋，NextLabs绝对是一个让你的职业成长的好地方。
我们的客户来自全球不同行业的大型1000家公司。在NextLabs, Inc.，你将有机会与世界各地的团队来帮助这些全球企业解决现实的问题。我们鼓励员工在盒子外思考，并结合深厚的技术与行业专长，用创新的方法来帮助做出不同。
 我们已经命名为Gartner集团的优秀供应商。我们的合作伙伴包括：IBM, SAP, Microsof, Siemens, HCL. 
我们提供很多很好的机会,为加入我们的员工提供良好的培训、职业晋升发展渠道：
1. 培训和交换学习机会： 优秀工程师有机会到美国/新加坡/马来西亚去进行短期培训或移民；或者公司全球其他研发中心交换生活学习；
2. 员工期权（stock options），
3.每天下午都有精美的下午茶/水果
4.每个季度团队活动
5.每年定期的春秋游
6.五险一金： 全额的公积金
更多公司信息，请点击：www.nextlabs.com
中国两个研发中心，杭州和南京，同步进行招聘。 
杭州：西湖区华星路99号创业大厦A601
南京：南京市建邺区宏普杰座11楼1101
